name: Sono Go No Crows
nutshell: The story takes place after the events in Crows. It focuses on the soon-to-be 6th TFOA Generation leader Tesshou (depicted in Worst) and his conflict with two Suzuran students (in the first chapter) and on Hanaki Guriko's entering Suzuran and becoming 'the strongest'.

name: Pufferman *Uncensored*
nutshell:
Born with an abnormal tumor on his cheeks, Victor was nicknamed "Pufferman".
However, he would soon grow to take a liking to the name.
Hi this is 10gusensei, author and artist of "Pufferman".
This comic contains scenes of NUDITY, EXTREME AND GRAPHIC VIOLENCE.
This series will continue to be 'violent' and 'graphical' in nature,
here on this platform you'll be reading UNCENSORED version of my comic.
From Season 2 onwards, I'll be placing more emphasis on improving my art style. Hence, uploads between chapters would vary.
work has started for me, so in my free time i'll draw and upload chapters, thank you readers for your patience, I appreciate it
Thank you all for following my first ever comic. <3

name: The Queen of Amaranth
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
The Queen of Amaranth, a legendary diamond that brings a glorious fate and eventually a dark death to those who possess it.
Mara Green, a young girl who happens to have this diamond in her possession, is catapulted up the ladder of happiness to the point where the crown prince of a small country beckons her to his bedside.
However, unexpected misfortune befalls Mara at the top, and her life is threatened.

name: Otaku God
nutshell:
ue to family reasons, Zongzheng Yue completely loathes otakus. He was originally living an ordinary life, but littering a soda can on a certain day triggered a series of events, and made a nonsensical girl who professed to be an otaku god enter his life. Under the otaku god’s instructions, Yue has no choice but to start learning how to become an otaku. Then, his loli senior and childhood sweetheart also began to enter Yue's life under the supreme otaku god Lan Ling's "interference".
Adapted from the Novel "My Ordinary Life Does Not Need An Otaku God".

name: Multiplying Wives - A Fairy Tail
nutshell: A 1980 short contributed to the manga anthology "Shonen Shojo SF Manga Kyousaku Taizeshuu".

name: Jinrui Sonbou Cockpit Girls
nutshell: Humanity is under attack by the "Imitators", monsters who attack cities and destroy everything in their path! The only defense that exists are the Dyn Machines and their young pilots who risk it all to stop them! The long anticipated Etorouji Shiono’s new series begins now...

name: Touhou Project - Sakuya-san is out of town
tags: Oneshot,Video Games,Girls' Love,Vampires,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell:
…and Meiling is lazing around.
 Artist’s Twitter
 Artist’s Pixiv

name: Secret Fruit
nutshell: Satoshi Mizushima, who has moved to a rural village, meets a girl on a stray mountain. What he doesn't know is that the village has a secret that should be left alone. Once you know the truth, things can never go back to how they were...

name: Horror Newspaper II
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Yuko Hondo is an ordinary girl who becomes possessed by the "Horror Newspaper" and is plunged into the depths of misfortune and fear. The newspaper causes a chain of turmoil around her, not only for her parents, but also for her uncle and aunt....
Fumito Tagaki, a transfer student who was victimized by the Horror Newspaper, approaches Yuko. He was fatally injured in an accident and died, but to her surprise, the spirit of Rei Onigata resides in him and he was able to come back to life.
The two work together to fight the evil forces of the "Horror Newspaper"!
Ten years have passed since the original "Horror Newspaper". Tonight, too, someone will receive it and experience a tidbit of misfortune!

name: Strike Witches - 501 Butai Hasshinshimasu! ROAD to BERLIN
Touhou - Aru Ai no Mahou (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A short story about Marisa visiting Alice home. MarixAli.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - Father and Daughter Story (Doujinshi)
Escape
nutshell: Video store clerk Amamiya Shouta has an unrequited crush on salaryman Shiraishi, while having sex on the side with fellow college student Kuraki. Shouta thinks of them as just sex friends, but Kuraki has a dark and possessive side that Shouta unwittingly brings to the surface…

name: Be Our Guest
nutshell: Izumi wants to inherit her mother's resturaunt, however, she has no natural cooking ability. Izumi's childhood friend Reiji also wants to inherit the resturaunt, however, he's a cooking prodigy.

name: Yamima no Mamiya
nutshell: It has been 20 years since the legendary mahjong player, Akagi, left this world. In this new era known as "Reiwa," a mahjong player who solves disputes with mahjong gambles has appeared, only known as "Yami-Mahjong Fighter Mamiya!"

name: Tsuki no Oki ni Mesu mama
nutshell:
In middle school, Ayumu kept getting teased and pranked by Runa, even though he's a year below her.
Now that she's in her second year of high school, she's ready to be the experienced senpai for the incoming freshman Runa.

name: Shiroyama to Mita-san
nutshell: Tatsuhiko Shiroyama hates being stuck in the boonies. Greetings from strangers feels fake, part-time job prospects are limited, and he's been "blessed" with the nickname "Niyayama" from his classmates due to his creepy, unsociable attempts at smiling. He turned to the radio as a means to escape, and thinks about nothing more than saving up for a move to Tokyo where he can explore his passions. But Tatsuhiko's life changes forever when he saves a rich CEO from a rice paddy and is set up with his granddaughter, the equally as shy and antisocial Tamiko Mita. Together, the two stumble through the nuances of "dating", and Tatsuhiko's dreary days become a whole lot brighter.

name: Jun na Kimochi de Icchimae!
nutshell: Tomo's eyes chase after fellow teammate Tanji. He knows he has fallen for Tanji already but what comes with first love, makes him both expectant and scared of getting hurt.

name: Touhou - Heating no Akyuu (Doujinshi)
nutshell: An Akyuu x Nitori doujin.

name: Champion's Path to Murim
nutshell:
“Mister Perfect”
A living legend in the realm of mixed martial arts, the Champion, Kim Sanghyuk, was somehow reborn in the Murim world as the youngest son of Keum Hojang!
“This time, I’ll forge a new legend in the Murim!”
Against the backdrop of martial artists and untrained fighters scattered around Murim comes an oddity trained in Boxing, Taekwondo, Muay Thai, Wrestling, Jujitsu, Capoeira, Judo, and a variety of modern martial arts, ready to shake up the Murim!

name: I met my favorite maid at my transfer school
tags: Oneshot,Crossdressing,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color

name: Hanayome wa Motodanshi.
nutshell: Chii and her husband are like any other happily married couple, except for one thing: Chii was assigned male at birth. Chii details her autobiographical account of growing up with gender dysphoria and ultimately deciding to transition in her early adult years. Shortly after Chii starts transitioning, she meets a man who is instantly enamored by her, and although he is surprised when Chii eventually tells him she used to live as a guy, he still wants to go out with her. As Chii continues to transition, her boyfriend supports her through the process, culminating in their marriage once her transition is complete.

name: Sorosoro, Sayonara.
nutshell: There is a famous person at my school. He's a young high school student who's a well-known novelist, and he's good looking and smart. There are rumors that he's a little weird, but teachers say that he's a quick study. It turns out that I have to confess to that famous person, Komaki-senpai, on behalf of my friend. That was the start of our friendship, but there's a rumor that Komaki-senpai sleeps with teachers…

name: Kirihara Mika no Yuuutsu
nutshell:
Collection of short stories:


Kirihara Mika no Yuuutsu
Mika's love life is not easy at all! Due to her overprotective and wild brothers every boy she likes run away from her. But is it going to be the same as always even with this girlish boy who really wants to stay by Mika's side!?


Shuugaku Ryoko Naisho no Koi
Megumi finds it discomforting being around boys yet on their class trip, she's assigned to sit next to Taketo-kun. After a small incident, they become friends, will romance bloom next?


Hajimari no, Kiss.


Hatsumei Princess Shizuka-chan!!


Nee, Boku ni Shina yo

name: Togainu no Chi - Tokimeki Natsuinu Graffiti (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Shiki x Akira

name: The Cute Wife of the Cold Chairman
nutshell: A punk girl turns into a great goddess to beat up scumbags and oppress fake angels. She angers all of the surrounding rotten women to death. After being reborn, I, Chi Yan, have to marry this brainless playboy with X disease? I found a handsome man to play my boyfriend, but he ended up trying to flirt with me every day! An icy chairman announced: My Yan'Er is the cutest in the world. I won't hold her back!

name: Kiseki no Koibito
nutshell:
Imaginary Lovers
A man reunites with his college love after three years only to find out that his thoroughly male love interest has apparently conceived, given birth to and raised a son in the three years since they parted. That this is anatomically possible doesn't even occur to our slightly dopey seme, who's just overjoyed at the prospect of getting back "the one that got away" plus a rather adorable half-sized extra.


Brothers
Two very different boys learn to co-exist when they suddenly find themselves living together and expected to act like brothers.


Supreme Logic Study
Two college students bask in domestic bliss after ten years of friendship, totally unaware of their true feelings for each other.


Twin
When Wataru dies in a traffic accident, he thinks he has no lingering attachments to the living world… if that's so, then why can't he pass on to his next incarnation? And what's keeping the sad-eyed boy who shares his lonely rooftop?


Bet
A bet turns into something much more infuriating…


D.H
A boy is enlisted to write love letters for his less-than-literate best friend… unfortunately, the object of his friend's affection is his own secret crush.
